languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс позволяет себе слегка улыбнуться.{/n} "Мы нанесли удар не просто культистам, а самому Архиврагу. Это не может не радовать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс позволяет себе слегка улыбнуться.{/n} "Мы нанесли удар не просто культистам, а самому Архиврагу. Это не может не радовать".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix permits himself the ghost of a smile.{/n} "We dealt a blow not only to the cultists, but to the Archenemy itself. I cannot help but be pleased."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс позволяет себе слегка улыбнуться.{/n} "Мы нанесли удар не просто культистам, а самому Архиврагу. Это не может не радовать".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希露出了一丝笑容。{/n}“我们不仅打击了邪教徒，还直接打击了混沌大敌本身。我无法克制心中的喜悦。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix permits himself the ghost of a smile.{/n} "We dealt a blow not only to the cultists, but to the Archenemy itself. I cannot help but be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希露出了一丝笑容。{/n}“我们不仅打击了邪教徒，还直接打击了混沌大敌本身。我无法克制心中的喜悦。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix permits himself the ghost of a smile.{/n} "We dealt a blow not only to the cultists, but to the Archenemy itself. I cannot help but be pleased."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se permite mostrar el levísimo asomo de una sonrisa.{/n} «Hemos infligido un golpe no solo a los sectarios, sino también al Archienemigo. ¿Cómo podría no estarlo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix permits himself the ghost of a smile.{/n} "We dealt a blow not only to the cultists, but to the Archenemy itself. I cannot help but be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se permite mostrar el levísimo asomo de una sonrisa.{/n} «Hemos infligido un golpe no solo a los sectarios, sino también al Archienemigo. ¿Cómo podría no estarlo?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはかすかな笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「我々は教団だけでなく、渾沌の勢力そのものに打撃を与えた。これを喜ばずにいられるものか」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix permits himself the ghost of a smile.{/n} "We dealt a blow not only to the cultists, but to the Archenemy itself. I cannot help but be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはかすかな笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「我々は教団だけでなく、渾沌の勢力そのものに打撃を与えた。これを喜ばずにいられるものか」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix gestattet sich den Anflug eines Lächelns.{/n} "Wir haben nicht nur den Kultisten einen schweren Schlag versetzt, sondern auch dem Erzfeind selbst. Ich kann nicht umhin, mich zu freuen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix permits himself the ghost of a smile.{/n} "We dealt a blow not only to the cultists, but to the Archenemy itself. I cannot help but be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gestattet sich den Anflug eines Lächelns.{/n} "Wir haben nicht nur den Kultisten einen schweren Schlag versetzt, sondern auch dem Erzfeind selbst. Ich kann nicht umhin, mich zu freuen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se permet l'ombre d'un sourire.{/n} « Nous avons porté un grand coup non seulement aux cultistes, mais également au Grand Ennemi lui-même. Alors oui, en effet, je suis pleinement satisfait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix permits himself the ghost of a smile.{/n} "We dealt a blow not only to the cultists, but to the Archenemy itself. I cannot help but be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se permet l'ombre d'un sourire.{/n} « Nous avons porté un grand coup non seulement aux cultistes, mais également au Grand Ennemi lui-même. Alors oui, en effet, je suis pleinement satisfait. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in çehresini belli belirsiz bir gülümseme alıyor.{/n} "Sırf tarikatçılara değil, Şerbaşı'nın kendisine de darbe indirmiş olduk. Memnun olmayayım da ne yapayım?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix permits himself the ghost of a smile.{/n} "We dealt a blow not only to the cultists, but to the Archenemy itself. I cannot help but be pleased."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in çehresini belli belirsiz bir gülümseme alıyor.{/n} "Sırf tarikatçılara değil, Şerbaşı'nın kendisine de darbe indirmiş olduk. Memnun olmayayım da ne yapayım?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
